ProductInfo.Features:
8 Bullet Cameras, 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof.
8 Dome Cameras, 1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Vandalproof IR Dome Camera, 700 TV lines, 36 LEDs, 98.4 feet IR Distance, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. 0.001 Lux
16 Channel H.264 video compression format *** FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H Recording *** 8ch 960H Full Channels Realtime Playback *** 4 USB Ports, Supports Up to 64TB (8 * 8TB hard drives)
iPhone Android Viewable *** Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output *** Support Icon Interface,User Friendly & Easy-Operate *** Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S. *** Package Includes: •	GW3016HD DVR with 8T HD •	GWLED19IN  - Free 18.5" Wide Screen LED monitor •	8 x GW30WD - 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera •	8 x GW115H - 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Indoor Camera •	1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable •	GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box •	16 x Power pigtail (GW082) •	16 x Power pigtail (GW132) •	32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
